name: Roger Persaud
seeking: Seeks JV partners who can refer professional clients needing business services or advisory support. Limited profile data suggests openness to cross-referral arrangements with aligned professionals in business or consulting areas.
what_you_do: The author of the book _America should be Grateful to Haiti_ is a retired veteran of US air force. He has 35 years of experience in the airline and manufacturing industry.
who_you_serve: The author seeks to be the voice of the oppressed one and to educate others about that.
social_proof: The author has made his appearances on major media outlets that include The World Tonight and Prime. Roger is also a sport enthusiast who played cricket at the international level.
signature_programs: The author has written a book titled _America should be Grateful to Haiti_.
niche: overlooked history, African history, oppressed people
business_focus: The author aims to bring to light the untold history and suffering of African people who suffered slavery and colonialism.
